resources.string: Welcome to the world of Pokemon! In this game, you have to find and battle wild Pokemon in order to train your own Pokemon that you catch along the way. Walk with your device and see your character move in real time! Train your pokemon to be strong enough to battle the Elite 4 in order to win the game! Best of luck to you Pokemon trainer!
You have chosen Charmander! Charmander is the fire type pokemon.
You have chosen Squirtle! Squirtle is the water type pokemon.
You have chosen Bulbasaur! Bulbasaur is the grass type pokemon.
Would you like to quit the game?
Thank you for visiting the PokeCenter! Your Pokemon have been restored to full health. We hope to see you again!
This button lets you adjust your settings and quit the game
If your Pokemon are running low in battle, use a potion to fully heal them
This button lets you access your own Pokemon and the Pokemon database
This button lets you restore your Pokemon to full health
Walk with your device in real time to move your player accross the map. Move forward, backward, and to the side.
Test your strength and battle the Elite 4 to become a Pokemon master!
This button lets you challenge the Elite 4
The game features a variety of buttons
This button gives you access to your items
My name is Agatha. Dont cry when I beat you!
My name is Bruno. Are you ready to lose?
My name is Lance. Watch me crush you!
My name is Lorelei. You stand no match for me!
Game created by Cameron Pilarski and Evan Page: CS4001
Please enter a player name: (1-14 chars)
Are you sure you would like to battle the Elite 4? If you are defeated, you will be forced to restart the game.
You cannot use this here. If you need to heal your Pokemon, please visit the PokeCenter on the homecreen.
Walk around with your device to move your player. Be careful, you may encounter wild Pokemon. Battle other Pokemon to level up your very own Pokemon
You have healed your pokemon to full health!
You Lost to the Elite 4. Thank you for playing. Signed - Evan and Cameron
You have successfully beaten the Elite 4! You are now a Pokemon Master! Thank you for playing, we hope you enjoyed your experience. Signed - Cameron and Evan
